author: GertvanElderen
post_text: September 23, 2014 at 11:08 AM#1Hi there,does somebody know the syntax commands for the MAtricks Options.I making a macro witch selects inside variable interleaves a kind of random fixtures and at presets or dimmer values.Im using so far al lot of Next/Prev commands to set the rigt single x.but it there a fast way, tried singlex or matricksx or matrickssinglex but they dont work.let me knowusing 3.0.0.5

posts.author: GertvanElderen
posts.post_text: September 23, 2014 at 11:08 AM#1Hi there,does somebody know the syntax commands for the MAtricks Options.I making a macro witch selects inside variable interleaves a kind of random fixtures and at presets or dimmer values.Im using so far al lot of Next/Prev commands to set the rigt single x.but it there a fast way, tried singlex or matricksx or matrickssinglex but they dont work.let me knowusing 3.0.0.5

posts.author: glad
posts.post_text: September 23, 2014 at 11:33 AM#2the singlex malue may be selected with the MatricksInterleave commande.g.MatricksInterleave 4.10should set Interleave to 10 and singlex to 4MatricksInterleave 15.0should set Interleave to Off and singlex to 15

posts.author: thruvik
posts.post_text: September 24, 2014 at 5:11 PM#3Can also be called as mi though the command line, to save you some typing.

posts.author: GertvanElderen
posts.post_text: September 24, 2014 at 10:03 PM#4ah thanks. thats helping a lot!

posts.author: DannyCaine
posts.post_text: March 8, 2015 at 2:05 AM#5What is the syntax for Wingstyle?Im trying to create a Macro for focusing positions which puts "Wings" at 2 and "Wingstyle" at Pan.The first half works fine..... MAtrickswings 2.Thanks

posts.author: glad
posts.post_text: March 8, 2015 at 11:53 AM#6the intended way to do this is via the MAtricks pool,Store your desired Matricks combination in the Pool.the MAtrick may be assigned directly to a userbutton, or be called via commandline from a macro

posts.author: DannyCaine
posts.post_text: March 9, 2015 at 1:18 AM#7Thanks Glad! Might you have any input on my post under "midi knobs control encoder using bomes pro"
